articles.title: Criminal gang jailed for more than 200 years after Europe-wide investigation into encrypted phones - Leicestershire Live
articles.description: An international operation from the UK, French, and Dutch authorities uncovered the county lines ring after they cracked an encrypted online chat platform they were using to communicate

articles.author: Alex Alderson
articles.title: Sony NW-A306 Walkman: New portable audio player announced shortly before global release - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Sony has presented the NW-A306 globally. Equipped with a small display, the NW-A306 will be the cheaper alternative to the NW-ZX707 that the company also announced today. The Sony NW-A306 Walkman will be available later this month in Europe, Japan and the UK.
articles.content: Sony has introduced the NW-A306 globally, a cheaper alternative to the NW-ZX707. The NW-A306 is also smaller than the NW-ZX707 and considerably lighter. For reference, the NW-ZX707 measures 72.5 x 13… [+1367 chars]
